participant_1.background:
I keep a healthy weight for my age.
i drive a four wheel drive vehicle.
I look for someone who can match my energy and who is also interested in spirituality.
i regularly go to the gym.
i enjoy walking around the park.

participant_2.background:
I love to go to pride parades and dance around with my friends!
i like to go to the casino on weekends.
i am currently trying to open my own grocery store.
I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
I have a side hustle that I do not tell my parents about because they wouldn't approve.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great! I'm excited to be talking to you!
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too! I like to go to pride parades and dance around with my friends! Do you like to dance?
I love to dance! I go to the gym regularly and I love to dance around the park.
That's awesome! I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
I love swimming in the lake too! It's so refreshing.
I also like to go to the casino on weekends. Do you like to gamble?
I don't gamble very often, but I do enjoy it when I do.
I'm currently trying to open my own grocery store.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great.
I'm sure you'll have a lot of customers. I love going to the grocery store.
Me too! I love trying new things.
Me too! I'm always looking for new experiences.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
